tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trophies (
    trophy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    trophy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    trophy_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES achievements(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_achievement (
    player_id INT,
    achievement_id INT,
    achieved_on TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (achievement_id) REFERENCES achievement(id),
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, achievement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_trophy (
    player_id INT,
    trophy_id INT,
    achieved_on TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trophy_id) REFERENCES trophy(id),
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, trophy_id)
);
